messages.msgSnippet: We could just put the person with the virus s address on block for a while and empty our trash folders frequently (since they re coming so fast) and once we
messages.messageBody:
We could just put the person with the virus's address
on block for a while and empty our trash folders
frequently (since they're coming so fast) and once we
see her virus is fixed, we can unblock her.
JUli
--- Linda Sternhill DavisG <lrsdavis@...>
